TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BasePartialCachingControl extends System.Web.UI.Control
Public MustInherit Class BasePartialCachingControl Inherits Control
public ref class BasePartialCachingControl abstract : System::Web::UI::Control

summary.span: 提供 和 類別的基本功能。

span.span: Provides the base functionality for the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示有輸出快取程式設計案例中啟用的使用者控制項。The class represents a user control that has output caching enabled in programmatic scenarios. ASP.NET 提供了數種方式啟用輸出快取控制項。ASP.NET provides several ways to enable output caching for a control. 下列清單描述您可用來啟用輸出快取的方法：The following list describes methods you can use to enable output caching: - 使用`@ OutputCache`指示詞，以啟用輸出快取中宣告的案例。Use the `@ OutputCache` directive to enable output caching in declarative scenarios. - 使用類別，讓使用者控制項程式碼後置檔案中的快取。Use the class to enable caching for a user control in a code-behind file. - 使用類別，以指定您正在使用的程式設計案例中的快取設定執行個體。Use the class to specify cache settings in programmatic scenarios in which you are working with instances. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立參考類別，並將它設定的值為屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a reference to the class and sets it to the value of the property. 程式碼會設定屬性讓控制項取決於文字檔案的物件。The code then sets the property to a object that makes the control dependent on a text file. [!code-csharp[BasePartialCachingControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BasePartialCachingControl/CS/dep1cs.ascx#1)] [!code-vb[BasePartialCachingControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BasePartialCachingControl/VB/dep1vb.ascx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CachePolicy As ControlCachePolicy
public: property System::Web::UI::ControlCachePolicy ^ CachePolicy { System::Web::UI::ControlCachePolicy ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與已包裝好的使用者控制項相關聯的 物件。

span.span: Gets the object that is associated with the wrapped user control.

value.span: ，可儲存已包裝好的使用者控制項之輸出快取相關屬性。

span.span: A that stores output caching-related properties of the wrapped user control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您以程式設計方式存取物件所包含的使用者控制項相關聯執行個體。The property enables programmatic access to the object associated with the user control contained by the instance. 物件可以用程式設計方式操作來影響使用者控制項的快取行為和設定。The object can be programmatically manipulated to influence a user control's caching behavior and settings. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範可以如何動態載入和執行階段以程式設計方式管理的使用者控制項。The following code example demonstrates how a user control can be loaded dynamically and manipulated programmatically at run time. 這個範例有三個部分：This example has three parts: - 部分類別中， `LogOnControl`，繼承自基底類別和要屬性會套用。A partial class, `LogOnControl`, that inherits from the base class and to which the attribute is applied. - 搭配使用的使用者控制項`LogOnControl`部分類別。A user control that is used with the `LogOnControl` partial class. - Web Form 網頁裝載使用者控制項。A Web Forms page that hosts the user control. 若要成功執行此範例，請確定使用者控制項檔案 (.ascx)、 （.cs 或.vb），其程式碼後置檔案和 Web Form 網頁裝載使用者控制項 (.aspx) 相同的目錄中。To run this example successfully, make sure the user control file (.ascx), its code-behind file (.cs or .vb), and the Web Forms page that hosts the user control (.aspx) are in the same directory. 此範例的第一個部分會示範如何套用至使用者控制項，名為`LogOnControl`，這表示使用者控制項包裝控制項在執行階段。The first part of the example demonstrates how the is applied to a user control named `LogOnControl`, which means the user control is wrapped by a control at run time. `LogOnControl`物件的快取設定可以透過程式設計方式是透過與其相關聯操作物件，可透過參考包裝它。The `LogOnControl` object's caching settings can be programmatically manipulated through its associated object, which is available through a reference to the that wraps it. 在此範例中，快取設定為檢查頁面的初始化期間，而且如果符合某些條件變更。In this example, caching settings are examined during page initialization and changed if some conditions are met. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/CS/LogonControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/VB/logoncontrol.vb#2)] 此範例的第二個部分顯示用於前面的範例示範使用者控制快取的使用者控制項。The second part of the example shows a user control that is used with the previous example to demonstrate user control caching. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/CS/Logonformcs.ascx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/VB/Logonformvb.ascx#3)] 此範例的第三個部分示範如何使用`LogOnControl`從 Web Form 網頁的使用者控制項。The third part of the example demonstrates using the `LogOnControl` user control from a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/CS/controlcachepolicy_loadcontrolcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ControlCachePolicy/VB/controlcachepolicy_loadcontrolvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Caching::CacheDependency ^ Dependency { System::Web::Caching::CacheDependency ^ get(); void set(System::Web::Caching::CacheDependency ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 類別的執行個體，而該執行個體是與已快取的使用者控制項輸出相關聯。

span.span: Gets or sets an instance of the class associated with the cached user control output.

value.span: 與伺服器控制項相關聯的 。

span.span: The associated with the server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您從輸出快取中移除使用者控制輸出相關聯的快取相依性變更時。This property allows you to remove user control output from the output cache when the associated cache dependency changes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性讓控制項取決於文字檔案的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to a object that makes the control dependent on a text file. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[BasePartialCachingControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BasePartialCachingControl/CS/dep1cs.ascx#2)] [!code-vb[BasePartialCachingControl#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BasePartialCachingControl/VB/dep1vb.ascx#2)]
